ResearchProjectDef.label: luxurious petalace crafting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to craft luxurious petalaces at the petalace crafting bench.\n\nThese petalaces have a lower affinity towards all spiribird pollen colours than the prism petalace, but boost the moult progress of their respective spiribug when one interacts with the petalace.

ResearchProjectDef.label: spiribug dust processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to properly melt down spiribug dust into useful minerals.\n\nThis process is somewhat wasteful in terms of potential value, as spirbug dust is more valuable in its natural form.
